mapper.sql: Id, MemberId, AccountType, No, Amount, Status, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, OptName, OptTime
mapper.insert: insert into recharge (Id, MemberId, AccountType, No, Amount, Status, Remark, CreateName, CreateTime, OptName, OptTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into recharge
Id,
MemberId,

No,

Status,

mapper.update:
update recharge
MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
No = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql:
1=1
and Status=${status}
and CreateName like ''%${createName}%''
and CreateTime>=''${startTime}''
and date_add(''${endTime}'', INTERVAL 1 day)>CreateTime
mapper.select:
{call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' Id desc ', ' a.* ', ' recharge as a ', '
', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=INTEGER} )}
mapper.update: update recharge set MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, No = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=REAL}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OptName = #{optname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OptTime = #{opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
